title: Game Progress Route
content:
tiny creature. He will introduce you to Boo, a hamster. He calls it a Miniature Giant Space Hamster, and that you will be able to learn the difference in time. Minsc and Boo will join your party, and cleanse Baldur's Gate of Evil together. Invite Minsc to your camp if you have a full party, and he will give you his approval. This will also complete The High Harper quest.

Return to the Guildhall once more by traveling to the Revealed Entrace at Lower City (X:57 Y:-96), to settle the matter with
